options: ['found another piece of paper on the ground.', "found his bag wasn't there", 'saw the runner running towards to him', 'both A and B']
questions: When Tom Brown came back, he   _  .
article: Once a great boxer , Tom Brown, went to a restaurant for dinner. He put his bag near the door, but he was afraid that someone would take it away. So he got out a pen and a piece of paper and wrote on it, "The great boxer, Tom Brown, left his bag here and he will be back in a few minutes." He put the paper on his bag and went to have his dinner. When he came back, his bag wasn't there. But he found a piece of paper on the ground. It said, "A great runner took away your bag, and will not be back."
